Types

Downloader = object
  dir*: string               ## Root directory for all downloads
  timeout*: int              ## Poll events timeout
  downTable: Table[string, tuple[url, path: string, error: ref Exception,
                                 state: DownState, fut: Future[void]]]
  Source   Edit 
DownState = enum
  NotDownloaded, Downloading, Downloaded, DownloadError
  Source   Edit

Procs

proc download(self: var Downloader; url, path: string; name = "";
              replace = false) {....raises: [KeyError, OSError, IOError, Exception,
    LibraryError, SslError], tags: [ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect, RootEffect,
                                    TimeEffect, ReadIOEffect, ReadEnvEffect].}
Starts an asynchronous download of url to path. path will be used as the name if name is empty. If replace is set to true and the file is downloaded overwrite it, otherwise if the file is downloaded and replace is false do nothing.   Source   Edit 
proc downloadAgain(self: var Downloader; name: string) {.
    ...raises: [KeyError, OSError, IOError, Exception, LibraryError, SslError], tags: [
    ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect, RootEffect, TimeEffect, ReadIOEffect,
    ReadEnvEffect].}
Downloads name again if exists, does nothing otherwise.   Source   Edit 
proc downloaded(self: Downloader; name: string): bool {....raises: [KeyError],
    tags: [ReadDirEffect].}
Returns true if name is downloaded AND the path exists.   Source   Edit 
proc downloading(self: Downloader; name: string): bool {....raises: [KeyError],
    tags: [].}
Returns true if name is being downloaded.   Source   Edit 
proc exists(self: Downloader; name: string): bool {....raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns true if a download with name exists.   Source   Edit 
proc getError(self: Downloader; name: string): Option[ref Exception] {.
    ...raises: [KeyError], tags: [].}
Returns the exception of name if it had a DownloadError.   Source   Edit 
proc getErrorMsg(self: Downloader; name: string): Option[string] {.
    ...raises: [KeyError], tags: [].}
Returns the error message of name if it had a DownloadError.   Source   Edit 
proc getPath(self: Downloader; name: string; joinDir = true): Option[string] {.
    ...raises: [KeyError], tags: [].}
Returns the path of name if exists, joined with the downloader's root dir if joinDir is true otherwise returns the raw path.   Source   Edit 
proc getState(self: Downloader; name: string): Option[DownState] {.
    ...raises: [KeyError], tags: [].}
Returns the state of name if exists.   Source   Edit 
proc getURL(self: Downloader; name: string): Option[string] {.
    ...raises: [KeyError], tags: [].}
Returns the url of name if exists.   Source   Edit 
proc initDownloader(dir: string; timeout: int = 1): Downloader {.
    ...raises: [OSError, IOError], tags: [WriteDirEffect, ReadDirEffect].}
Initializes a Downloader object and creates dir.   Source   Edit 
proc remove(self: var Downloader; name: string) {....raises: [KeyError, OSError],
    tags: [ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect].}
Removes name's path if it exists and set the state to NotDownloaded.   Source   Edit 
proc update(self: var Downloader) {....raises: [Exception, ValueError, OSError,
    KeyError], tags: [RootEffect, TimeEffect, ReadDirEffect, WriteDirEffect].}
Poll for any outstanding events and check if any download is complete.   Source   Edit
